text: This paper presents a case study on the design and usability of Health Informatics and Telehealth Interfaces to improve access to healthcare services for marginalized populations. By examining a specific case, this study aims to provide insights into the complex challenges faced by underserved communities in accessing healthcare services. The research delves into the design principles and user experiences of telehealth interfaces, highlighting the importance of user centered design in addressing disparities in healthcare delivery. The findings shed light on the potential of technology to bridge the gap in healthcare access and contribute to reducing poverty by ensuring equitable healthcare services for all.
style: Case Study: This style presents an in-depth examination of a specific case or situation, aiming to provide insights into complex phenomena or phenomena that are context-specific.

text: This paper explores the implementation of Green Chemistry and Engineering practices in the industrial sector to promote sustainable development and alleviate poverty. A case study analysis highlights the positive impact of eco friendly technologies on improving social and economic conditions, emphasizing the importance of integrated approaches in achieving sustainable industrial practices.
